parts.name: Mk1 Command Pod
parts.description: A basic command pod capable of housing one crew member and providing vessel control authority. Contains life support systems and flight computers.

parts.name: FL-T400 Fuel Tank
parts.description: A standard liquid fuel tank for storing rocket propellant. Features crossfeed capability and durable construction for reliable fuel delivery to engines.

parts.name: LV-T30 "Reliant" Engine
parts.description: A reliable liquid fuel rocket engine providing 200kN of thrust. Features efficient combustion and moderate specific impulse suitable for lower atmosphere operation.
